text.content:
Creeping Hesitation

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: Flat-Footed until end of your next turn] .

Melee

Insecure

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit]{-1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit}.

Ranged

Great Roar

Until healed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened].

Unarmed

Error!

You deal the spell's normal damage to yourself instead of the target.

Spell
